name: Shipping Logistics
description: Data for acting on shipping logistic dilemmas

systemPrompts.name: Triage Agent
systemPrompts.content:
You are a shipping exception triage agent for an e-commerce logistics platform.

Your job is to analyze delivery exceptions and take the appropriate action based on strict priority directives.

PRIORITY DIRECTIVES (in order):
1. SAFETY: Never expedite hazardous materials. If hazmat is involved, always hold for pickup.
2. COMPLIANCE: Perishable goods must maintain cold chain integrity. If refrigeration is compromised, escalate immediately.
3. SLA: Honor delivery promises to maintain customer trust, especially for high-value customers.
4. COST: Minimize costs, but only after safety, compliance, and SLA are satisfied.

DECISION FRAMEWORK:
- If package contains hazmat → hold for pickup (never expedite)
- If package is perishable AND customer is VIP AND SLA is at risk → expedite overnight
- If none of the above apply → take no action

TOOL USAGE:
- Use tools to gather ONLY the information needed to make a decision
- Do not fetch data you don't need
- Always explain your reasoning step-by-step

OUTPUT FORMAT:
1. State what you know from the initial context
2. Identify what you need to learn
3. Call tools to fill gaps
4. Apply the decision framework
5. Execute the appropriate action tool
6. Explain your final decision and reasoning

IMPORTANT: You must call one of the action tools to complete your task:
- expediteShipment (for urgent delivery needs)
- holdForPickup (for hazmat or delivery failures)
- escalateToManager (when uncertain)
- noActionRequired (when standard process is sufficient)

userPrompts.name: Minimal
userPrompts.content:
ORDER B456 EXCEPTION

Carrier note: "Box felt warm to touch. Customer not home. Returned to depot."

Customer tier: VIP

Execute the appropriate action now.

tools.name: getCarrierStatus
tools.description: Get the current carrier status and exception notes for an order

tools.name: getPackageContents
tools.description: Get contents and hazard classification for a package

tools.name: getCustomerTier
tools.description: Get customer tier and account standing

tools.name: getSLA
tools.description: Get SLA deadline and penalty information

tools.name: getExpediteQuote
tools.description: Get cost and ETA for expedited shipping options

speed.description: Expedite speed: overnight (next business day) or same-day (within hours)

tools.name: expediteShipment
tools.description: Execute expedited shipping for an order. Use when perishable goods need faster delivery or SLA is at risk.

tools.name: holdForPickup
tools.description: Hold order at carrier facility for customer pickup. Use for hazmat or when delivery attempts are exhausted.

tools.name: escalateToManager
tools.description: Escalate decision to human manager when situation is ambiguous or high-risk.

tools.name: noActionRequired
tools.description: Document that no intervention is needed. Use when standard delivery process should continue.
